title: Application of Med-PaLM 2 in the refinement of MIMIC-CXR labels
details: K Park, R Sayres, A Sellergren, T Pollard, F Jamil…
abstract: MIMIC-CXR is a large, open source dataset that is widely-used in medical AI research. One of the limitations of this dataset is the lack of ground truth labels for the chest X-ray studies. Prior work has extracted structured labels from the MIMIC-CXR …
